bibl.title: Naphtali Lewis (1911-2005).

series.title: Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia".

bibl.note: The first part of the notice was published in BASP 43 (2006) pp. 5-8; the second part [Toli from the Archives] was delivered (in a shorter version) at the Assemblée générale of the Association Internationale de Papyrologues, Ann Arbor, 4 August 2007.

bibl.title: Hermae. Scholars and Scholarship in Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: Mario CAPASSO (Ed.), Hermae. Scholars and Scholarship in Papyrology. II = Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia". 7 (Pisa - Roma, 2010) pp. 51-53, fig. IX.

The first part of the notice was published in BASP 43 (2006) pp. 5-8; the second part [Toli from the Archives] was delivered (in a shorter version) at the Assemblée générale of the Association Internationale de Papyrologues, Ann Arbor, 4 August 2007.
